''But hey, wouldn't it be fun too see new and maybe your old playmates again?'' he quickly tried to cheer you up.

You smile. ''I guess.''

Already before you knew it, you and Laen were inside the Daycare. ''Miss Rose, I've come to bring an old friend.'' The old lady behind the counter looks up. ''Hey.. is that you Laen? And Rade! You guys have grown so much!'' the old lady answers. You walk up to the counter, and the lady let you in. ''I'll pay you back when I come back, Rose. I can't miss my flight now. Oh, and hey, Rade?'' You look up to Laen who puts out his fist. You look at his fist and you brofisted him, ofcourse minding your spike on your paw, because that would hurt. ''Bye, Laen..'' you looked sad. 1122.content:
You were at home, just casually laying on the couch when you notice Laen walking in. ''Oh, hey Laen.'' You notice something in his hands. ''What you got there?'' you asked. ''Airline tickets, Rade, We're going to the Sevii Islands for an vacation.'' Laen says. You immediately get up from the couch. ''All right! Uh.. You only got 2 tickets.. will.. Will Jenna go with you?'' you ask, hoping for him to say no. Jenna is Laen's bitchy girlfriend, to you, it feels like she could dump Laen any day for anyone else, you really hated her. ''No, she won't be coming, unfortunately. She says she's going to be busy this week, and the tickets are gonna expire soon, so, why not take you with me?'' You jump up excited, and hug your master gratefully. ''This will be so sweet!'' you say happily. Master Laen also happily embraced you, and released you again. ''All right, we're going to leave tommorow, pack your things and wake up early tommorow, okay?'' Master Laen said. ''Okay.'' you answered.

You walked off. Man, it has been such a long time since you and Master Laen has spent quality time together.. You quickly pack your things and get to sleep early, since it was already pretty late.

The next morning, you both woke up early, and went to the airline together. After the long and usual shit-wait at the airlines, you both finally got to your airplane, and you both sit of tiredness from standing in line all day. ''Man, waiting at the airport sucks balls.. jeez..'' Laen complained. ''At least we're here, Master. Just try to relax.'' you say, as you relax yourself, letting yourself slide into the most lazy position, with both your hands on the chairsides. ''Yeah.. At least we're in.'' he said, as he was about to lay his hand on the prop you were leaning on, but didn't notice your hand there. You felt his hand on your paw, and looked to the side to your master. ''Weird, this prop feels pretty fluffy and nice compared to other flightseats.'' Laen said. ''Uh, Master.. that's my paw.'' you chuckle. ''Wh-wha?!'' he said, quickly letting go of your paw. ''S-sorry, I wasn't paying attention.'' he said, blushing. ''N-no, it's okay.. accidents happen..'' you say. You can't lie about feeling nice about this.. It was quiet for a minute, but everything soon went back to normal, and you conversed the whole flight.

The Airplane arrives after quite some time, and you both scurried off to the hotel you booked, and checked in. You got your keys, and went to your room. You both enter the room, and you look at all the cool luxury. A bath, a menu for room service, and almost everything was covered in gold and red fabric. Even the double bed! ...wait, Double bed..? Your heart starts racing. Oh, man.. you're supposed to sleep with Master Laen in one bed? You blush.
''A double bed..? That's weird.. Hold up, let me ask at the infortmation booth..'' he said, as he walked away.

You wait for a few minutes, he's still not here.. that's when..
1122.title: On an vacation with you.

info.brief_description: Write the romantic love story of our dear Lucario between an Pokemon or Human.
info.description:
In this interactive, you play the role as either an male or female Lucario, while in the meantime of your story, getting to know your partner and starting to get in love with each other.

The Rules are as following:
- DEVELOP AN ROMANTIC STORY WITH YOUR PARTNER.
- Sure, you can have sex, but don't be too hasty with it, develop some romance between you and your partner first.
- Don't kill yourself/others, people or Pokemon can only faint.
- Fetishes are allowed, just avoid bruises and the more dirty fetishes.
- About the dirty fetishes, you/your partner CAN be a little gross like an burp or fart, but leave it at that. (This carpet is very expensive, okay?)
- I have nothing against gay/lesbian stories, so, go on ahead and write your story.
- Don't write half-assed chapters, and let it make at least a little bit of sense. Just trying your best will develop the best stories too.

That's about it. So, go on ahead, feel free to make an story/chapter, and have fun!
